transcript: At Jersey mics, they slice your order fresh right in front of you. And let me tell you, watch in that, can send a rush of emotions through a person. Excitement, impatience, baby-like wonder, indecisive, anticipatory chewing, nerves pacing, happy claps, and finally jealousy, because that's this guy's self. I should order one. Good idea. Slice right in front of you. To Jersey mics thing, a sub above.
